name: opik
displayName: Opik - Save and share your chat history
description: Export your chat history from Cursor to Opik.

opik.apiKey.description: Opik API Key used to store your chat sessions - Can be found at https://www.comet.com/api/my/settings/

opik.projectName.description: The name of the Opik project to store Cursor chat sessions in

opik.VSCodePath.description: Path to the VSCode user data directory. Leave empty to use the default path.

opik.skipHistoricalConversations.description: Skip conversations without new messages. When enabled, only conversations with new messages are processed. When disabled, all unsynced conversations are processed.

opik.apiUrl.description: Opik API URL endpoint for MCP server communication.

opik.workspace.description: Opik workspace name for MCP server operations.

opik.mcp.enabled.description: Enable automatic registration of the Opik MCP server with Cursor for enhanced context in chats.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
